thread.title: Shahrukh Khan To Inspire People With TedTalks!
thread.title_full: Shahrukh Khan To Inspire People With TedTalks!

title: Shahrukh Khan To Inspire People With TedTalks!
text:
Â» Shahrukh Khan To Inspire People With TedTalks! Shahrukh Khan To Inspire People With TedTalks! Shahrukh Khan is all set to feature in a television series of TedTalks and will inspire people with his speeches and stories about how he made it in life. Updated:   13:09   
Shahrukh Khan is an inspiration to many across the globe and his speeches strike a chord with a large section of society who dream and aspire to be like him. His story from being a common middle class man to emerging as the biggest and richest superstar of the country can leave anyone starstruck.Also Read: Amy Jackson: To Work With Salman Khan Is A Dream! The only way to consume inspiring speeches online were through TedTalks, where a plethora of people from different spheres of life, speak up about their journey, struggles and success in their respective platforms. It is now reported that Shahrukh Khan is all set to feature in Shahrukh Khan elaborated about his TedTalks by saying, "People will share stories about changes in society, in life - whether it's about the climate, dangerous diseases or to help empower women - and all of this will be integrated. There are some beautiful stories - both Indian and international - which the team is planning to get on one platform and do a nice mix of Hindi and English speakers. I feel it will be a niche show."Also Read: Sunny Leone 'Takes Everything As It Comes' Also, this time, SRK will not be seen on an online platform but the TedTalks will be a television series which the actor will be hosting. He also revealed that he's shot the first episode already. "We shot one episode and we are still doing a lot of focus screening because it's something that should be done with love. All the people from TED are keen that I do it."
